name: BroilKingiQue
0:
”Alexa, what is the temperature of my grill”
”Alexa, what is the temperature of probe 1”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Monitor the temperature of your Broil King Grill with Alexa. Discover the Broil King iQue skill in the Alexa app and link the account you signed up with to the Broil King iQue app. You can now ask Alexa what your probes and grill temperatures are.
